abstract: Susan C. Ervin, who has worked at the Commodity Futures Trading Commission and the Securities and Exchange Commission, will join the law firm’s Washington office as a partner.
snippet: Susan C. Ervin, who has worked at the Commodity Futures Trading Commission and the Securities and Exchange Commission, will join the law firm’s Washington office as a partner.
lead_paragraph: Susan C. Ervin, a longtime federal derivatives regulator, will join Davis Polk & Wardwell as a partner in the law firm’s Washington office.

headline.main: Davis Polk Hires Former Derivatives Regulator

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
